cause.description:
our national parks and wild life reserves are unique to our country and are very special, its wat forms part of evey south african, but those bastard poachers, hunters and developers are messing up our chances of preserving these special place, lets organize for this shit to stop, AND SAVE THE HONEYBADGER
1. PRESERVATION OF OUR NATURAL HERITAGE
2. STOP CRUELTY TO ANIMALS FROM THOSE IGGNORANT AND ARROGANT HUNTERS
cause.mission: save the wild parks and untouched places in southern africa
cause.name: our ntural home
